title: Rise above rat race: The amazing portable balconies by designer Goetz Schrader offering a '15 minute vacation' that could be coming to a city near you soon
text:
View
comments
Ever wanted to be instantly transported to another panorama without the hassle of packing a suitcase or having to travel?
Time-poor city dwellers might soon be able to look to the skies for the chance to take a micro-adventure in the form of a '15 minute vacation'.
German designer Goetz Schrader has unveiled plans for a portable balcony which small groups could rent in a variety of settings to host intimate gatherings above the daily grind.
Sundowners in the sky: Groups could hire the balcony in time to watch the sunset or for an evening party on a beachfront
Privacy: The rentable balconies enable urban dwellers to take a few moments away from everyone else
The concept is to create a unique and unexpected breakout space anywhere the balcony is transported to which could be in the heart of a crowded city in the middle of the day or to a secluded beach at sunset.

A tonic to our busy urban lives, Mr Schrader has designed the concept of the 15-minute vacation to offer people a different perspective on their local area, if only for a short time.
The slick portable structure is similar to a construction lift with renters able to climb on board at ground level and activate a button to rise to the height of a first story building. The roofless balcony can house furniture, lights, games and refreshments.
Respite from the rat race: As a portable structure break out spaces are possible in even the most crowded of cities
Still in the planning stage, Mr Schrader told MailOnline Travel that the lifts would be ideal if rentable across big urban spaces as a new type of city furniture.
He said: 'In order to make a design like this efficient, it ideally is sponsored by a city.
'I believe that these designs need to be seen as recreational installations within a crowded city. As the size of affordable living space shrinks, for example with parks in London being partly privatised- an idea like this is meant as a counterpart to those developments.'
15 minute vacation: At the height of a first storey building the structures offer a new perspective
Dynamic: Different balcony designs and furniture style can be fixed to the rising crane structure
